description:
Receive a complimentary workshop when you buy selected cameras.
Owning a camera presents a wonderful opportunity to capture beautiful stories. To help you acquire the essential skills and knowledge, we are offering a complimentary workshop designed by Canon Academy that will give you a firm grasp of photography, videography & vlogging fundamentals. Turn a mediocre shot into a great one with this camera workshop.
How it works:
1.Purchase an eligible DSLR, Mirrorless or Compact camera from the list below
2.Receive the product
3.Send an email
canonacademy@canon-me.com with your proof of purchase to receive your choice of a complimentary face to face or online workshop.
name: CANON ACADEMY COMPLIMENTARY PHOTOGRAPHY WORKSHOP

description:
We offer free standard delivery on all orders of AED 1.00 and above. Please note, this free standard delivery charge is only applicable to the final basket amount. If you would like to return your order, our returns policy gives you a 14-day window in which to send your item back free of charge, for a full refund. We aim to deliver most items within 1-5 working days, though this may take longer for remote or island locations. Direct delivery is by our approved suppliers.

Dubai & Northern Emirates – delivery within 1 to 3 business days
Abu Dhabi – delivery within 2 to 5 business days

All delivery options are subject to availability and working days exclude public holidays.

On rare occasions, we may need to deliver items outside the published time windows. Unfortunately we are unable to guarantee delivery within our usual timescales to a small number of remote areas.

Please note, we reserve the right not to deliver an order if we believe the address is not secure. If this affects an order you place, we will notify you as soon as possible.
short_name: Free standard delivery on all orders of AED 1 and above
name: Free standard delivery on all orders of AED 1 and above
